subject: Cable roto
description_text:
Buenos días, compré recientemente unos pedales simsonn x plus y durante el
montaje el cable del freno se rompió internamente. Cómo puedo solicitar una
reparación desde España? Un saludo

conversations.body_text: Hi Néstor Luis,  Please provide some photos or videos.

En la primera foto se aprecia la deformación en el cable, en la segunda
corté el cable para comprobar q efectivamente estaba roto. Intenté soldarlo
pero ne temo que está afectado el resto del cable también.

El lun, 8 sept 2025, 10:35, support@simsonn.com

Hi Néstor Luis,    Please kindly provide your contact name, phone number, and shipping address. We will send you a replacement brake pressure sensor free of charge today.  To install the new sensor, you’ll need an M6 Allen (hex) wrench. If you’re comfortable with basic DIY tasks, you can replace the sensor yourself. This is recommended because the return shipping cost would exceed the value of the pedal, and replacing the sensor directly is much faster and more economical.

Good morning, great support service, congrats.
Name: Néstor Luis Castro.
Phone: 661136146
Address:  Calle La Audiencia 41, 38280 Tegueste , Santa Cruz de Tenerife,
Spain.
Kind regards.

El mié, 10 sept 2025, 1:13, support@simsonn.com
Hi Néstor Luis, Could you please provide the tracking or order number so we can assist you as soon as possible? Thank you!

Lo siento no entiendo, en tu último mensaje me dijiste que me enviabas otra
célula de carga. A que se refiere?

El mié, 10 sept 2025, 7:50, support@simsonn.com
Hi Néstor Luis,  Could you please provide the order number of your purchase so we can check and assist you accordingly? Thank you!

Saludos, lo compré en la tienda oficial de aliexpress
Order 3058105463289657

El mié, 10 sept 2025, 8:49, support@simsonn.com

Por favor, ignoren la dirección de la factura, es una casa familiar, enviar
a la dirección que escribí en el mail. Gracias

El vie, 12 sept 2025, 5:42, support@simsonn.com
Hi Néstor Luis,  Your order has been shipped. Estimated arrival time: 10 to 25 days.The logistics number is:YT2525500704489492. You can track it at this website https://www.17track.net/zh-cn.

El vie, 12 sept 2025, 8:33, support@simsonn.com
Hi Néstor Luis,    Alright, I’ll check with the operations team about this issue first and then get back to you.

Hi Néstor Luis,    Hello, the shipping address you provided is located on an island, and our partnered international logistics service is unable to deliver there. Our e-commerce customer service team tried to reach you but didn’t receive a response, so we used the address from your July order to process the shipment.

Buenos días, está bien, intentaré que alguien lo coja y me lo envíe. Un
saludo

El sáb, 20 sept 2025, 2:27, support@simsonn.com
